Message.Title: Tax increases, more regulation, bigger deficits, Obamacare, golf
Message.Msg: Is the 2013 agenda for our esteemed leader....hide your wallet cause the Democrats know they ain't enough money from the rich to pay for all the spending. What kind of a country are you fools going to leave your grandchildren.

Message.Title: Hoisted on his own petard
Message.Msg: Dumbo used the laughable Supercommittee of John Kerry and Patty Potatohead Murray to kick the can down the road. Guess what? This is the end of the road. shut her down!!! HAHAHAHAHAHA!!

Message.Title: Why does bammy always seem bitter
Message.Msg: and ensures there will never be bipartisan agreements when he pounds his pud on the public podium?...i'll tell you why...cause crown of the camel's azzzes gave him aids....pus xs 8 is a pre-ejaculating minute man...jb two timed him..and he bit his tongue falling out of a chair tryin to lick his nuts.....

maybe he would make more head wind by leading instead of taunting and thumbing his nose...he should give NK or Iran a try when he's done with the US....he'd be more welcome there.....he's a devisive leader...can this country stand another 4 years of it....that's yet to be seen.....a reflection of the majority people who voted him in.........jealous, insecure, lazy..not a proud bone in their body...just like.............you
